name: Dominic Bruetsch
description: Dominic Bruetsch is a founding partner and lead blockchain security engineer at ChainSecurity. He specializes in smart contract audits on Ethereum, Starknet, as well as  zk circuit audits. He holds a master's degree from ETH Zurich, one of the best universities in the world for computer science, in electrical engineering with a focus on networks and computer science. He found vulnerabilities in the Ethereum protocol itself, which landed him a sport on the Ethereum Bug bounty leaderboard.
